chat.server

Class ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.server.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represents a server thread working with a client, always waiting for messages from the client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientThread(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      Instantiates a new client thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean actionLogin(java.lang.String username)
      Tries to login the given username to the server.
      boolean actionLogout()
      Logouts the client of the server.
      DataUser getUser()
      Gets the user.
      void run()
      Runs the thread.
      void send(ServerMessage msg)
      Send a message to the client
      void sendGoodbyeMessage()
      Send goodbye message to all.
      boolean sendNewMessage(DataMessage message)
      Send a new message to all clients connected to the server The server will first check if this is a command, and interprets it.
      void sendWelcomeMessage()
      Send welcome message to all.
      void stop()
      Stop to listen messages.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientThread

        public ClientThread(java.net.Socket socket,
                    Server server)
        Instantiates a new client thread.
        Parameters:
        socket - the socket
        server - the server

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the thread. This wait for a welcome message, and then wait for messages from the client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop to listen messages.

      • send

        public void send(ServerMessage msg)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Send a message to the client
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the message could not be sent

      • getUser

        public DataUser getUser()
        Gets the user.
        Returns:
        the user

      • sendWelcomeMessage

        public void sendWelcomeMessage()
        Send welcome message to all.

      • sendGoodbyeMessage

        public void sendGoodbyeMessage()
        Send goodbye message to all.

      • sendNewMessage

        public boolean sendNewMessage(DataMessage message)
        Send a new message to all clients connected to the server The server will first check if this is a command, and interprets it.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Returns:
        true

      • actionLogin

        public boolean actionLogin(java.lang.String username)
        Tries to login the given username to the server. This sends a ServerMessageConnectionError to the client if he cannot connect with this name.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user was able to login, false otherwise.

      • actionLogout

        public boolean actionLogout()
        Logouts the client of the server.
        Returns:
        true
